core

Class CentralServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.CentralServer

  • public class CentralServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage the list of resources.
    Author:
    Benoit Travers, Paul Chaignon, Clement Gautrais

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CentralServer()
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getBestMove(java.lang.String fen, int gameId)
      Get the suggestion of move from the resources and compute the best answer.
      java.lang.String getDebugInformation(java.lang.String fen)
      Build a big debug information string in HTML with: - the moves suggested by each resources with their scores; - the total scores for each moves suggested; - the move choosen.
      static void rewardResources(int gameId, int gameResult)
      Reward the resources depending on their participation in the game.

    • Method Detail

      • getBestMove

        public java.lang.String getBestMove(java.lang.String fen,
                           int gameId)
        Get the suggestion of move from the resources and compute the best answer.
        Parameters:
        fen - The FEN.
        gameId - The game id.
        Returns:
        The best move or null if no suggestion.

      • getDebugInformation

        public java.lang.String getDebugInformation(java.lang.String fen)
        Build a big debug information string in HTML with: - the moves suggested by each resources with their scores; - the total scores for each moves suggested; - the move choosen.
        Parameters:
        fen - The FEN.
        Returns:
        The debug information string.

      • rewardResources

        public static void rewardResources(int gameId,
                   int gameResult)
        Reward the resources depending on their participation in the game.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The game id.
        gameResult - The game result: -1 for lose, 1 for win, 0 for draw.
